description: Made from natural seeded cotton. Floral embroidery at the placket is inspired by a Henley shirt from the 1930s. Woven reinforcements at the interior provide a homespun feel. Washed for added softness.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 27.5" front body length, a 17.5" shoulder, a 40.75" chest, and a 34" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes 1" between sizes.
Henley neckline. Three-button placket with floral embroidery. River-shell buttons.
